name: AMPforEndpoints_IsolationStart
author: Cisco Security
description: Start host isolation for an AMP for Endpoints connector

configurationItems.name: amp_cloud
configurationItems.description: FQDN of the AMP for Endpoints cloud to interact with

configurationItems.name: client_id
configurationItems.description: Client ID for AMP for Endpoints

configurationItems.name: api_key
configurationItems.description: API Key for AMP for Endpoints

configurationItems.name: unlock_code
configurationItems.description: Custom unlock code used to stop isolation from the endpoint (Maximum 24 characters)

configurationItems.description: Client ID for AMP for Endpoints

configurationItems.name: api_key

configurationItems.description: Client ID for AMP for Endpoints

configurationItems.name: api_key
configurationItems.description: API Key for AMP for Endpoints

configurationItems.name: group_guid
configurationItems.description: AMP for Endpoints Group GUID for the group connectors will be moved to

name: DNS-RPZ
author: Michael Hornung; Expeditors International of Washington, Inc.
description: Add a dynamic DNS entry to a Response Policy Zone, blackholing or redirecting a FQDN.

configurationItems.name: bind_server
configurationItems.description: IP or FQDN of RPZ master BIND server

configurationItems.name: tsig_keyname
configurationItems.description: Name of TSIG key to access BIND server

configurationItems.name: tsig_keyval
configurationItems.description: TSIG key value to access BIND server

configurationItems.name: tsig_hashalg
configurationItems.description: TSIG hash algorithm to use

configurationItems.name: rpz_zonename
configurationItems.description: Fully qualified RPZ zone name (don't forget the trailing dot)

configurationItems.name: remediation_ip
configurationItems.description: IP to resolve RPZ names to

name: DomainToolsIris_AddRiskyDNSTag
author: DomainTools
description: Add Tag saying that the case contains a risky DNS.

configurationItems.name: high_risk_threshold
configurationItems.description: Risk score threshold to be considered high risk.

name: DomainToolsIris_CheckMaliciousTags
author: DomainTools
description: Add Tag saying that the observable and case have a malicious tag in their Iris Tags.

configurationItems.name: monitored_iris_tags
configurationItems.description: Monitored Iris tags.

name: Crowdstrike Falcon Custom IOC API
author: Michael
description: Submit observables to the Crowdstrike Falcon Custom IOC api

configurationItems.name: falconapi_url
configurationItems.description: Crowdstrike Falcon host url

configurationItems.name: falconapi_user
configurationItems.description: Crowdstrike Falcon query api user

configurationItems.name: falconapi_key
configurationItems.description: Crowdstrike Falcon query api key

name: KnowBe4
author: Kyle Parrish
description: Add 'Clicked Event' to User via User Events API.

configurationItems.name: api_url
configurationItems.description: Base API url

configurationItems.name: hive_url
configurationItems.description: Specify The Hive Instance URL

configurationItems.name: api_key
configurationItems.description: Api Key

configurationItems.name: required_tag
configurationItems.description: Specify a tag that must be present for responder to run.

configurationItems.name: event_type
configurationItems.description: Specify the Event Type for the new event. https://developer.knowbe4.com/events/#tag/Event-Types

configurationItems.name: risk_level
configurationItems.description: Specify the desired risk level. https://developer.knowbe4.com/events/#tag/Events/paths/~1events/post

name: Mailer
author: CERT-BDF
description: Send an email with information from a TheHive case or alert

configurationItems.name: from
configurationItems.description: email address from which the mail is send

configurationItems.name: smtp_host
configurationItems.description: SMTP server used to send mail

configurationItems.name: smtp_port
configurationItems.description: SMTP server port

configurationItems.name: minemeld_url
configurationItems.description: URL for Minemeld instance

configurationItems.name: minemeld_user
configurationItems.description: User for Minemeld

configurationItems.name: minemeld_password
configurationItems.description: Password for Minemeld

configurationItems.name: minemeld_indicator_list
configurationItems.description: Name of indicator list to which indicators will be added

configurationItems.name: minemeld_share_level
configurationItems.description: Share level for indicator

configurationItems.name: minemeld_confidence
configurationItems.description: Confidence level for indicator

configurationItems.name: minemeld_ttl
configurationItems.description: TTL for indicator

name: QRadar_Auto_Closing_Offense
author: Florian Perret
description: Closing the QRadar Offense associated to your case in one clic !

configurationItems.name: QRadar_API_Key
configurationItems.description: A QRadar API key with sufficent rights to close an offense

configurationItems.name: QRadar_Url
configurationItems.description: URL of your QRadar API, must be accessible from Cortex server. eg: myqradar.myorg.com/api/siem/offenses

configurationItems.name: Cert_Path
configurationItems.description: If you need a certificate to authentificate to your QRadar API, please provide the path here

name: Redmine_Issue
author: Marc-Andr√© DOLL
description: Create a redmine issue from a case

configurationItems.name: instance_name
configurationItems.description: Name of the Redmine instance

configurationItems.name: url
configurationItems.description: URL where to find the Redmine API

configurationItems.name: username
configurationItems.description: Username to log into Redmine

configurationItems.name: password
configurationItems.description: Password to log into Redmine

configurationItems.name: project_field
configurationItems.description: Name of the custom field containing the Redmine project to use when creating the issue

configurationItems.name: tracker_field
configurationItems.description: Name of the custom field containing the Redmine tracker to use when creating the issue

configurationItems.name: assignee_field
configurationItems.description: Name of the custom field containing the Redmine assignee to use when creating the issue

configurationItems.name: reference_field
configurationItems.description: Name of the case custom field in which to store the opened issue. If not defined, this information will not be stored

configurationItems.name: opening_status
configurationItems.description: Status used when opening a Redmine issue (if not defined here, will use the default opening status from the Redmine Workflow)

configurationItems.name: closing_task
configurationItems.description: Closing the task after successfully creating the Redmine issue
